articles.title: Himalayan glaciers on track to lose up to 75% of ice by 2100, report says - Reuters.com
articles.description: Glaciers in Asia’s Hindu Kush Himalaya could lose up to 75% of their volume by century’s end due to global warming, causing both dangerous flooding and water shortages for the 240 million people who live in the mountainous region, according to a new report.
